idea: HR Toys , For your happiness we have soft Teddy and Car toys with and without remote control, halicopter with hand sensors and remotely controlled and many more Entertainment Equipment
name: HR Toys

idea:
An Application for Zoological parks where users can 
1. Online tickets 

2. Electric Vehicle Booking (as per the time slot.)

3. Animal Information in multiple languages (Audio & Text).

4. Adoption (days, Week, Month, Year) and Donation.

5. AR solution 
5.1. AR in the mobile app where we can see as well as listen to audio (Voices) of endangered animals like dinosaurs 

5.2. AR set up in the zoo so that the user doesn't need to use a mobile phone (a 5 minute show after every 15 minutes)
name: E-Zoo

idea: BornTough aims to put its best possible efforts to bring a change in the country by spreading the Spirit of Sports. The major objective of the company is to build as many as possible sports centers and involved the highest possible number of people to play Sports either to adopt it as their profession or with an aim to be fit and healthy. The company will keep on investing its time, money and energy to evolve Sports in India. It will do whatever it is needed to shine Indiaâ€™s name in International sports through providing training and support to Sportsmen and also by organizing continuously international events at various parts of the country.
name: BORNTOUGH SPORTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Janhitinternational is an online platform dedicated to assisting pilgrims planning to perform Hajj and Umrah. We specialize in offering Hajj and Umrah travel and tour packages for Indian Muslim pilgrims. We have helped travelers from across entire India to fulfill their duties by exceeding their expectations for a well-planned, well-executed Hajj and umrah travel experience. Our packages are designed to cater to all categories of affordability, and luxuries and according to the budget of each family group.
name: JANHIT INTERNATIONAL TOURS & TRAVELS PRIVATE LIMITED
